description.value:
Granted Powers: You can speak with and befriend animals with ease. In addition, you treat Knowledge (nature) as a class skill.

Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.5s4e2iifhflglr1t]{Calm Animals}
  • 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.yyzf346hiq8ixt0u]{Hold Animal}
  • 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.io2yjhr42chvcfb4]{Dominate Animal}
  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.choriern682hgptb]{Summon Nature's Ally IV} (animals only)
  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{Beast Shape III} (animals only)
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.76t09cafayrw13ux]{Antilife Shell}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.3ah9mmg0odateh8l]{Animal Shapes}
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.lnpyf5gwn8m21y02]{Summon Nature's Ally VIII} (animals only)
  • 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{Shapechange}
